EmailTemplate.name: Baltimore Foundation
EmailTemplate.subject: Baltimore vets share your stories
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
I had a quick favor, our records indicate that you attended the Baltimore Orioles game last summer. We are working with a local Baltimore foundation to bring more programs to the Baltimore area. We'd love to hear some comments about what it means to you to be an IAVA members. We just need some brief quotes on why you are a member, what it means to be a member and what you have done with us and if it impacted you.
It doesn't have to be perfect, we just need something kind of quick - we are looking to get comments in by 2pm today. I understand if you are not able to, because this is a last minute request.
Please just reply to this email address if you have a story to share. Thanks!
Thanks for your continued support.
Sincerely, Jason
Jason Hansman Membership Director Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA)
